reviews: As I am a CMA student so everytime I have to be motivated to focus on my study to clear my exams after reading this book which is very much helpful to get motivate. Really this book is much helpful to get motivate, to concentrate, to focus and one last thing the ideas and trick given by Shilpi Mam is really going to help if we follow with all handwork rather than thinking what we should do, how we will clear exams. So Thankyou Mam for such a wonderful thoughts sharing with us via this book.

reviews: This books is a MASTERPIECE. I would like to proudly state that I was a part of Shilpi Ma'am's first batch of CA Course and one of whose who cracked the exams under her guidance.When I read this book, I feel that Shilpi Ma'am's guidance (which we used to get from her during our classes) embedded in this books is a FOUNDATION for those who wants to achieve their target of become a CA.Although I was a student from a Marathi Medium, her guidance helped a lot and I cracked my all CA levels.I recommend to students who want to crack the CA course, must read this book and it will give you the direction to crack the exam.Further, I can strongly say that one who follows this book's guidance is bound to overcome the CA exams like I did.

reviews: I got interested to read this book after having a look at the reviews and it surely was worth it.The author knows how to connect with the readers because she starts off with examples about her personal life and connects all the dots by bringing in her learnings and her tremendous experience of teaching many students In-Person.Reading this book you will learn a lot of different techniques and ways to plan your exam preparation.Will highly recommend anyone to have a look at it irrespective of the exam you are preparing for because there's a lot of insightful information here.Thank you CA Shilpi Kothari!
